channel.title: modules on Cláudio Silva's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in modules on Cláudio Silva's Blog

item.title: PowerShell Modules Central - Share with community - What PowerShell modules are you using?
item.description: Like the blog post title states this is all about sharing with others! My idea is to share with the community which PowerShell modules you are using. Let me introduce to you the PowerShell Modules Central PowerShellModulesCentral is a GitHub repository that was founded as a central hub to a list of PowerShell modules that people know/use. Each module has a file describing its name, basic information about the module, as well as one or more blog posts/videos from people that have written about or used them.
